text: Xerces appears to be always trimming leading and trailing whitespaces for attribute values regardless of the datatype defined in the schema. For example, given the following XML and schema, The value of attB1 is reported as "A B C" rather than " A B C ". attB1 is defined as "string", so the value of which should be reported as intact. -Takuki Kamiya
